fields.name: Possible Items:
fields.value:
- Slushie: Skip the next player's turn
- Slim Jims: Target player draws 2
- Cigarettes: Ignore all draw and skip effects that would happen to you until the start of your next turn
- Fried Taquito: Discard a card

Post 710
**Life** (<:wild:1106237191388143838>)
- When played, all players draw 3 cards
- Players may play an additional card on their turn until another <:wild:1106237191388143838> card is played

desc:
Post 711
- Open a shop until the start of your next turn. On other players' turns, in addition to playing a card, they may choose to buy something from your shop. When they buy an item, the next card they draw will be replaced by a wildcard with that item's effects on it.
- When your shop closes, you discard a card for each card bought from you.
